Package net.tnemc.core.account

Class Account

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.transaction.receipt.ReceiptBox
net.tnemc.core.account.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerAccount, SharedAccount
public class Account extends ReceiptBox
An object that is used to represent an Account within the economy plugin.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

  • Method Details

    • type

      public String type()
      Used to get the type of account that this is. This is for data-purposes only.
      Returns:
      The account type.

    • isPlayer

      public boolean isPlayer()
      Used to determine if this account represents a Player.
      Returns:
      True if this account represents a Player, otherwise false.

    • supportsInventoryBalances

      public boolean supportsInventoryBalances()
      Used to determine if this account supports balances based on inventories. This is usually item-based currencies, or experience-based currencies. This should only return true if the account is a player.
      Returns:
      True if this account supports balances based on inventories.

    • getHoldingsTotal

      public BigDecimal getHoldingsTotal(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency)
      Used to get the BigDecimal value of this account's holding based on the specifications.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      Returns:
      The total of every HoldingsEntry for the specifications.

    • getHoldingsTotal

      public BigDecimal getHoldingsTotal(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Calculates the total holdings amount based on the provided region, currency, and type.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use for calculations.
      currency - The currency to use for calculations.
      type - The type of identifier to filter the holdings entries.
      Returns:
      The total amount of holdings for the specified region, currency, and type.

    • getHoldings

      public List<HoldingsEntry> getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • getHoldings

      public List<HoldingsEntry> getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      type - The identifier of the holdings handler to use.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • getAllHoldings

      public List<HoldingsEntry> getAllHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      type - The identifier of the holdings handler to use.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • setHoldings

      public boolean setHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull HoldingsEntry entry)
      Sets the holdings for the specified entry in this wallet.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry to set in this wallet.

    • setHoldings

      public boolean setHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull HoldingsEntry entry, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Sets the holdings for the specified entry and in this wallet.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry to set in this wallet.
      type - The identifier of the holdings handler to use.
